front.title: Creating File System Object Attachments with MIME

abstract.t: This memo defines a new top level type for MIME and its subtypesand mappings to file types. The intent of this draft is to both define a new comprehensive toplevel type and define a method and usage for one of the to be definedsubtypes. This new subtype in itself is a media type. The purpose ofwhich provides a mechanism to move a structured set of files systemobject structures (directories and/or files) as a MIME attachmentfrom one environment to another while preserving common elements.
